      • instantiateDatasetFinder

        public static <T extends Dataset> DatasetFinder<T> instantiateDatasetFinder(java.util.Properties props,
                                                                            org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                                                                            java.lang.String def)
                                                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Instantiate a DatasetFinder. The class of the DatasetFinder is read from property DATASET_PROFILE_CLASS_KEY.
        Parameters:
        props - Properties used for building DatasetFinder.
        fs - FileSystem where datasets are located.
        Returns:
        A new instance of DatasetFinder.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • instantiatePathFilter

        public static org.apache.hadoop.fs.PathFilter instantiatePathFilter(java.util.Properties props)
        Instantiate a PathFilter from the class name at key PATH_FILTER_KEY in props passed. If key PATH_FILTER_KEY is not set, a default ACCEPT_ALL_FILTER is returned
        Parameters:
        props - that contain path filter classname at PATH_FILTER_KEY
        Returns:
        a new instance of PathFilter. If not key is found, returns an ACCEPT_ALL_FILTER
